description.value:
Your symbiotic link to fungi and your ability to tap into the cycle of life and death grants you access to certain spells. At 2nd level, you learn the spectral hand - materia cantrip.

At 3rd, 5th, 7th, and 9th level you gain access to the spells listed for that level in the Circle of Spores Spells table. Once you gain access to one of these spells, you always have it prepared, and it does not count against the number of spells you can prepare each day. If you gain access to a spell that does not appear on the druid spell list, the spell is nonetheless a druid spell for you.

Circle of Spores Spells
Druid LevelSpells
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpectralHa]{Spectral Hand}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.mycojDbHOZg2luJc]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.qzaWw6GhSHWn5ksJ]{Gentle Repose}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.3YszGKeKcRAu6KqE]{Animate Dead}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.nziWfOYRpN1xj3Gb]{Gaseous Form}
7th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.zQDppbmxyBQZnWKL]{Blight}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.IVSsvCN7diHIuseG]{Confusion}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.LEyin1xp5bLgpooC]{Cloudkill}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.4FaXMyU2b5DXqnFv]{Contagion}
